page.title: 10More Recreational Activities
page.content: The Pubs are in the local villages with the Robin Hood in Smithfield, the Black Lion in Hethersgill,the Heilk Moon in Scaleby and the Cliff Inn not actually in a village but on the road to Longtown. LADIES the ladies of the area have a Women's Institute Group in Hethersgill and Smithfield.These are very popular and provide a range of varied activities and outings. Quite a number of the ladies serve on local committees and it would appear that most of the organizing is done by the women of the area. The area is served by three churches, one for each parish but they are all served by only the one vicar though each has its own church council and although they work together they are fiercly independent.
